questtag.questtext: Commander: Agent, one of our suspects have digested a radioactive isotope together with two unknown compounds. We have reason to believe this might trigger a chain reaction leading to some sort of bodily explosion. Investigate and disarm the targets pacemaker using your Rad'o'Meter and EMP Pulse! Over and Out.

Commander: You are operative near the delta three sector and we have just received news that a group of terrorists have deployed a nuclear device nearby. Please make haste with this one! Over and Out.

Commander: Good work with that device agent! We have another urgent mission for you. I believe our military may have dropped a broken arrow in your area and you have to find it before it goes off. Over and Out.
Commander: We have reports coming in about suspicious behavior in your sector. A person may have hidden a dirty bomb and we need you to investigate at once. Over and out.
Commander: A nearby nuclear reactor have been sabotaged. You need to retrieve a missing radioactive piece of equipment that were stolen. We believe it may be in your sector. Over and out.

Commander: Agent, you are now in sector 1337. This is quite a bit of a walk, but a bit over a kilometers distance you will find a silo containing a nuclear missile. Use your Rad'O'Meter and take it out with the EMP. Good luck Agent!

Commander: We have been compromised!. Our supercomputer have been playing wargames and have now turned against us! It is trying to detonate a nuclear charge in our underground office. Try to get on top of us and blast it out with the EMP. Over...
